pages.text: The probe is a tool that provides some basic block informations. Some examples:$(li)Name of the block$(br)$(li)the mod of the block$(br)$(li)tool to harvesting this block$(br)$(li)RF energy$(br)$(li)(Sneak)Items in the inventory of this block.$(br2)To get this overlay you must first craft a probe.

pages.title: The Probe
pages.text: Can also combined with any helmet in a workbench, so you don't have to carry it around with you.
